Vim pela punheta, continuei pelo desafio, e acabei como um gênio. Este curioso jogo vai estimular suas capacidades mentais, além de ter um estilo completamente inovador e original. Nem preciso comentar sobre a trilha sonora, mesmo relativamente repetitiva, é digna de uma obra prima. 09/10 jogaria de novo.

Although there are plenty of bugs, I always find myself coming back to play this game. I used to be a ps4 player and it was the same way back when I played on that. The community can be a little toxic at times, but overall the game is super fun when you have people you can hang out with and if you are not super competitive.

เป็นเกมที่สนุกอีกเกมหนึ่ง ไม่ว่าจะเล่นคนเดียวหรือไปเป็นปาร์ตี้ แต่ถ้าเป็นผู้เล่นใหม่แล้วจะไปคนเดียวแนะนำว่าควรหาข้อมูลก่อนว่าเปิร์กไหนทำอะไรได้ เข้าเกมไปแล้วควรเล่นอย่างไร 
แต่ปัญหาที่พบคือเป็นเกมที่มีบัคค่อนข้างเยอะเวลาเล่น ไม่ว่าจะการติดในเพลทที่โดนพับลง การติดในเสาฮุคเมื่อโดนเพื่อนยกลงมา และอื่นๆ อยากให้ทางทีมงานใส่ใจและแก้ปัญหาเรื่องบัคให้ดีขึ้น ปัญหาผู้เล่นhackไอเทม hackระบบการเล่นก็ค่อนข้างสร้างปัญหา เนื่องจากตัวเกมเป็นการเล่นร่วมกันของคน5คน ถ้ามีคนใดคนหนึ่งhackระบบเกม ก็หมดสนุกแล้วค่ะ

è un gioco online, con meccaniche abbastanza facili e divertenti, lo consiglio per chi cerca un gioco online con cui divertirsi anche con amici in modo competitivo.

I'll put it simply like this. The game is tons of fun. Specially when you play as a killer because, the way I see it, that's the objective.

...What's not fun is getting paired up with a 4 man team of tw*ts and getting a face full of flashlight everytime you try to do anything. If you can see (you see what I did there?) past that then this game is gonna be amazing for you.

I'll give it a 7/10
really good game, but dont have friends on discord anymore so yeah it's getting boring real fast :(
Its a fun game at its core and the only thing i would be annoyed about, is that it is theoretically pay/play to win at the same time

Dead by Daylight is an amazing game that you can easily spend hours playing. Whether it be surviving with friends or playing as a killer, there are endless possibilities for how the game can be played due to the vast variety of perks, add-ons, items, survivors, and killers. Lots of potential and I hope the devs can truly make this game even better than it already is!
<3 ну раньше, а сейчас полная дисбалансная помойка :D
Good with friends. Hard learning curve, addicting but over complicated. Not as toxic as other people make it out to be (trust me I've played a lot of multiplayer games)

This game needs so much work with micromanaging skills.  The game lacks any kind of charm or enjoyment when the creators have created a "best line up only" for perks.  So if you're not using a,b,c,d you have no chance of winning against a killer that is also using the best a,b,c,d they can.  There should be a point distribution when it comes to skills or the skills should be broken down into categories such as "mental, strength, speed, ect."  Games that are based around "whoever has played longer wins" are so insanely lackluster and kills the entire vibe of trying to play a game.  Instead of enjoying "4 years" I might suggest overhauling your game and actually putting effort into making it at least some what balanced.


Just to add a bit to this they've now completely ruined MMR in games essentially putting rank 1 killers up against 13-20 rank players under the guise that the killer hasn't played there selected killer a lot.  Trust me, this game is complete garbage and they put no effort at all into the game but will certainly pump out skins for your money.

El juego es muy bueno y demasiado entretenido, me gustaría que hubiera una selección más amplia de asesinos por lo menos aunque lo que si me ha desagradado un montón son los buggs y el horrible matchmaking que tiene el juego ya que me ha tocado en muuuuchas partidas con gente de rangos muy superiores cuando yo apenas estoy comenzando a jugar, eso no tiene ningún sentido para un juego que ya tiene 4 años.

Strategy, fear, cooperation, luck. It is a game where you can enjoy 4 elements in harmony.

I think the most attractive element of this game is the number of cases per perk(=skill) combination. Players can choose from four of the many perk (=skill), allowing for individual or efficient play.

As the beginner, you'll find a perk setting that is'efficient for survival'. But over time, you'll see all sorts of funny, back-stitching strategies in the number of these perk combination cases. 

Games I've met so far, if the characters of the same appearance, use the same skill, and the role was also the same. But in DBD, The Dwight you met this time will behave differently than the one you just met. In other words, the game unfolds in a completely different way, depending on what perk the players encounter in each ritual.
